1.0.0.name: wordpress/wp-e-commerce-product-showroom
1.0.0.description:
Description:A categorized product list multi widget/shortcodes.Works with the WP e-commerce(tested on 3.8.6 version). You can choose the number of products, the image size, category, change its css properties, use shortcodes. Based on Sample Hello World Plugin 2 (http://lonewolf-online.net/) by Tim Trott(http://lonewolf-online.net/) and WP e-Commerce Featured Product by Zorgbargle | Phenomenoodle http://www.phenomenoodle.com

More info about the plugin: http://www.wpworking.com/
